name: Prince of Persia: Harem Adventures
summary: Prince of Persia: Harem Adventures is a mobile game port of Prince of Persia developed by Gameloft. The game was first released in September 2002 in a monochrome version on Siemens C55. The initial version lacked a combat system. The game was re-released in color, and with combat on several other mobile devices. Later versions also featured a music in the menu.
